definition: bronze (alloy of copper 銅|铜 and tin 錫|锡[xi1])
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
Qingtong county level city in Wuzhong 吳忠|吴忠[Wu2 zhong1], Ningxia
Qingtong county level city in Wuzhong 吳忠|吴忠[Wu2 zhong1], Ningxia
the Bronze Age/also written 青銅時代|青铜时代[Qing1 tong2 Shi2 dai4]

sentences.english: King David's statue was made of bronze and it attracted many sculptors .
sentences.chinese: 大衛王的塑像是用青銅鑄造的，吸引了無數的雕塑家。

sentences.english: There is a bronze statue in the park.
sentences.chinese: 公園裏有一尊青銅色的雕像。

sentences.english: Dragon pattern is the main manifestation of ornamentations on bronze in the period of Shang to early western Zhou.
sentences.chinese: 龍紋是商周時期青銅器裝飾藝術的一大主題。

sentences.english: Mr. Reese's Bronze turkeys have a family tree.
sentences.chinese: 里斯飼養的青銅色火雞是有家譜的。

sentences.english: The statue was cast in bronze.
sentences.chinese: 這座塑像是用青銅鑄成的。

sentences.english: The motifs are classic Chinese ones that are variations on themes that go all the way back to Zhou dynasty bronzes .
sentences.chinese: 圖案是典型的中國式，以周朝青銅器上的圖案爲遠祖。

sentences.english: The more alkaline of the soil is, the more serious corrosion on the bronze.
sentences.chinese: 偏鹼性土壤中，鹼性越強對青銅器的腐蝕越嚴重。

sentences.english: No. 4 semi-portal crane has been used in Qingtongxia Hydropower Station for more than 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 青銅峽水電廠4號半門式起重機投入運行已30餘年。

sentences.english: Mio Groups large bronze sculpture has become a number one brand in the same industry.
sentences.chinese: 宇達集團的大型青銅雕塑已成爲國內同行業第一品牌。

sentences.english: Sheffield "Bronze" semi-flow of escalating oil lamp.
sentences.chinese: 謝菲爾德半嵌入式安裝在加油青銅燈。

sentences.english: Oliver: You’re looking for a Bronze Star like the one Cleo wore?
sentences.chinese: 你們在找青銅星麼，就像Cleo帶的那種？

sentences.english: Yes, the bronze-animals around the platform are all hollow.
sentences.chinese: 是的，平臺四周的青銅製品是中空的。

sentences.english: Using real material like glass, stainless steel, bronze and gold (24K)
sentences.chinese: 使用真材實料例如玻璃，不鏽鋼，青銅和24K金。

sentences.english: A national treasure – Dragon Carved Bronze Plate – dated back to late Shang Dynasty is preserved here.
sentences.chinese: 現有晚商時期的國寶級文物青銅蟠龍大盤。

sentences.english: This article studies the method of removing chlorine lose from the experimental rusty brass slices.
sentences.chinese: 文章主要研究了去除鏽蝕青銅試片中的氯離子的方法。

sentences.english: The Shang dynasty saw the discovery of bronze and the practice of sericulture .
sentences.chinese: 商朝時發現了青銅，開始學會養蠶。

definition: bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
Four Treasures of the Study, namely 筆|笔[bi3], 墨[mo4], 紙|纸[zhi3] and 硯|砚[yan4]/the essentials of calligraphy and scholarship (idiom)
